meanings.definition: Plan or invent (a complex procedure, system, or mechanism)
meanings.sent1: She was devising a new recipe for the school bake sale.
meanings.sent2: The engineers are devising a plan to improve the efficiency of the machine.
meanings.sent3: While devising a plan to catch the mouse, they accidentally caught the cat instead.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a busy workshop, constantly devising new ideas and solutions.
meanings.sent5: The artist was devising a masterpiece in her studio, surrounded by colorful paints and brushes.

meanings.definition: Formulate a method or plan for (a course of action)
meanings.sent1: He is devising a strategy to win the chess tournament.
meanings.sent2: The team is devising a schedule for the upcoming project.
meanings.sent3: The detective was devising a clever plan to catch the jewel thief.
meanings.sent4: The coach was devising a game plan to defeat their toughest opponent.
meanings.sent5: The students were devising a plan to surprise their teacher on her birthday.
